item.title: 阿里巴巴人工智能收入攀升，但中国食品战影响利润
item.description: 阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司（Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.）报告称，中国人工智能热潮带来的收入激增，帮助抵消了因与美团和 JD.com Inc. 在互联网商务领域的争斗加剧而出现的利润意外下滑。【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. reported a surge in revenue from China’s AI boom, helping offset a surprise drop in profit tied to a worsening battle with Meituan and JD.com Inc. in internet commerce.】

item.title: 腾讯支持的乌兹别克金融科技独角兽 Uzum 着眼于欧洲债券和首次公开募股
item.description: 随着当地企业越来越多地向国际市场寻求资金，乌兹别克斯坦最有价值的初创企业--金融技术和电子商务公司乌祖姆（Uzum）--正在考虑如何尽快在明年筹集更多资金。【原文：Uzbekistan’s most valuable startup, the fintech and e-commerce company Uzum, is considering ways to raise more funds as soon as next year, as local businesses increasingly look to international markets for capital.】

item.title: 降息、特朗普与美联储之争，美元将在八月后走弱
item.description: 由于投资者为经济疲软和降息做准备，美元在 8 月份创下今年以来的最佳表现后出现回落。【原文：The dollar retreated in August after posting its best month this year as investors prepare for a weaker economy and interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 股票牛市为九月的季节性动荡做好准备
item.description: 有迹象表明，股票牛市正在向不可持续的水平推进，对此忧心忡忡的投资者很快就会有另一种担心。【原文：Investors fretting over signs the bull market in stocks is pushing toward unsustainable levels will soon have another thing to worry about.】

item.title: Amundi 看好大跌后法国债券和股票的抄底买盘
item.description: Amundi SA首席投资官Vincent Mortier表示，在法国总理弗朗索瓦-贝鲁（Francois Bayrou）出人意料地要求进行信任投票后，法国债券收益率飙升，在此情况下，逢低买盘正在重返法国债券市场。【原文：Dip buyers are returning to French bonds after yields surged following a surprise call for a confidence vote by Prime Minister Francois Bayrou, Amundi SA Chief Investment Officer Vincent Mortier said.】

item.title: 穆里尼奥离开费内巴切对投资者而言价值 2,600 万美元
item.description: 通常情况下，解雇知名主教练是一个坏兆头。但对费内巴切的投资者来说却不是这样，这家土耳其足球俱乐部周五解雇穆里尼奥后，其股价大涨。【原文：Usually, the sacking of a renowned head coach is a bad sign. Not for investors in Fenerbahce, whose shares jumped after the Turkish football club sacked Jose Mourinho on Friday.】

item.title: 穆克什-安巴尼寻求在 2026 年 6 月前将 Reliance Jio 上市
item.description: 亿万富翁穆克什-安巴尼（Mukesh Ambani）的目标是在 2026 年上半年将印度最大的无线运营商上市，因为信实工业有限公司（Reliance Industries Ltd.）希望释放股东价值，并为投资者提供退出途径。【原文：Billionaire Mukesh Ambani is aiming to take India’s largest wireless carrier public by the first-half of 2026, as Reliance Industries Ltd. looks to unlock shareholder value and provide an exit route for investors.】

item.title: DeepSeek 助力中国科技冠军华为恢复盈利
item.description: 华为技术有限公司（Huawei Technologies Co.【原文：Huawei Technologies Co. posted a first-half profit, getting back into the black after the emergence of DeepSeek ignited a wave of AI development across China.】

item.title: 中国最大银行因减值增加而利润下降
item.description: 中国最大的银行--中国工商银行股份有限公司（Industrial & Commercial Bank of China Ltd.）上半年利润下降，原因是利润率持续下降，贷款损失不断增加。【原文：Industrial & Commercial Bank of China Ltd., China’s largest bank, posted a decline in profits in the first half of the year as it contends with a persistent drop in margins and rising loan losses.】

item.title: 花旗集团证券公司和 Tower 公司对印度交易所进行罕见投资
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，亿万富翁肯-格里芬（Ken Griffin）的 Citadel Securities LLC 和高频交易巨头 Tower Research 正在参股印度国家商品及衍生品交易所有限公司（National Commodity & Derivatives Exchange Ltd.），这标志着全球做市商首次在印度进行此类投资。【原文：Billionaire Ken Griffin’s Citadel Securities LLC and high-frequency trading giant Tower Research are taking minority stakes in India’s National Commodity & Derivatives Exchange Ltd., according to people familiar with the matter, marking the first such investment in the country by global market makers.】

item.title: 福特可能削减南非两家工厂约 9% 的工作岗位
item.description: 福特汽车公司计划在南非的两家工厂裁员 470 多人，而此时来自印度和中国的汽车进口量正在猛增。【原文：Ford Motor Co. plans to cut more than 470 jobs at two plants in South Africa, just as imports of cars from India and China jump.】

item.title: 长江和记考虑电讯业务选项，包括在香港上市
item.description: 亿万富翁李嘉诚控制的长江和记控股有限公司（CK Hutchison Holdings Ltd.）正在考虑各种方案，其中包括其全球电信业务在香港上市的可能性。【原文：CK Hutchison Holdings Ltd. is considering options including a potential Hong Kong listing of its global telecom business, people familiar with the matter said, as the conglomerate controlled by billionaire Li Ka-shing reviews its global empire of assets.】

item.title: 中国谴责伊朗 "回马枪 "制裁计划不具建设性
item.description: 中国对欧洲就伊朗核计划重新实施制裁的计划提出质疑，并警告说这可能会使局势恶化。【原文：China questioned Europe’s plan to snap back into place sanctions on Iran over the nation’s nuclear program, warning it could make the situation worse.】

item.title: 英伟达的高速增长使股票估值远离泡沫区
item.description: 尽管人们对 Nvidia 公司的天价市值将其股价推向泡沫领域颇有微词，但其收入增长却让投资者持续买入。【原文：For all of the handwringing about Nvidia Corp.’s sky-high market value pushing the stock into bubble territory, its revenue growth is keeping investors buying.】

item.title: 预算案再次呼吁征收银行暴利税后，英国贷款机构业绩下滑
item.description: 在英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）再次呼吁通过向银行征收暴利税来筹集数十亿英镑的急需收入后，英国贷款机构的股票出现下滑。【原文：Shares of UK lenders slumped after Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves faced renewed calls to raise billions of pounds of much-needed revenue by imposing a windfall tax on banks.】

item.title: 奇货可居：Emi Nakamura 关于泰勒规则的研究（播客）
item.description: 后科维德时代的通胀将成为学术经济学家的宝库，因为他们要研究通胀的驱动因素，以及一旦通胀开始，中央银行有多大的能力来遏制通胀。在今年的杰克逊霍尔经济研讨会上，加州大学伯克利分校教授中村惠美（Emi Nakamura）发表了一篇新论文，该论文由她与伯克利分校的同事扬-斯坦森（Jón Steinsson）和维南斯-里布利耶（Venance Riblier）共同撰写，题为《超越泰勒规则》（Beyond the Taylor Rule）。这篇论文试图探讨全球央行在经济增长中做出的各种选择。【原文：The post-Covid inflation will prove to be a treasure trove for academic economists, as they study what drives inflation, and the power that central banks have to contain it once it gets going. At this year’s Jackson Hole Economic Symposium, UC Berkeley professor Emi Nakamura presented a new paper — co-authored with her Berkeley colleagues Jón Steinsson and Venance Riblier — titled, Beyond the Taylor Rule. The paper sought to look at the wide range of choices that global central banks made in dea】

item.title: 在即将进入刚果市场后，不列塔姆寻求更多非洲扩张机会
item.description: 肯尼亚市值最大的上市保险公司正在计划向保险渗透率较低的非洲国家扩张，以增加收入并实现收入多样化。【原文：Kenya’s biggest publicly traded insurer by market value is planning expansion in African nations with low insurance penetration to augment and diversify revenue.】

item.title: 担心美国关税影响，印度卢比跌至创纪录水平
item.description: 由于担心美国征收 50%的关税会影响印度的经济增长和企业盈利，印度卢比兑美元汇率跌至历史新低。【原文：The Indian rupee slumped to a record low versus the dollar on worries over the impact of 50% US tariffs on the country’s economic growth and corporate earnings.】

item.title: 礼来与中国科技巨头合作销售肥胖症药物
item.description: 礼来公司正在与中国在线医疗保健平台京东健康国际有限公司合作，在网上销售其治疗肥胖症和糖尿病的大片药物，这是继竞争对手之后，通过直接面向消费者的渠道推动销售的又一举措。【原文：Eli Lilly & Co is partnering with Chinese online healthcare platform JD Health International Inc. to sell its blockbuster drugs for obesity and diabetes online, following in competitors’ footsteps to drive sales through direct-to-consumer channels.】

item.title: 中国建筑商海泉计划通过代币化债务筹集资金
item.description: 中国建筑商海泉集团有限公司（Seazen Group Ltd. ）计划在今年年底前发行代币化私人债务，作为其进军香港政府青睐的数字资产领域的一部分。【原文：Chinese builder Seazen Group Ltd. plans to issue tokenized private debt by the end of the year, as part of its foray into the Hong Kong government’s favored digital asset space.】

item.title: 英镑走强令英国公司增加套期保值措施，痛苦与日俱增
item.description: 受今年英镑飙升和美元下滑的影响，英国公司正在加强对外汇波动的防范。【原文：Buffeted by this year’s surge in sterling and the slide in the dollar, British companies are upping their protection against foreign-exchange swings.】

item.title: 中国 1.3 万亿美元的股票暴涨加剧了对前景的争论
item.description: 中国股市本周再创强劲涨势，加剧了关于中国股市命运的争论，中国股市的涨势不畏国家经济困境，仅本月市值就增加了 1.3 万亿美元。【原文：Chinese stocks capped another strong week of gains, intensifying a debate over the fate of a rally that’s defied the nation’s economic troubles to add $1.3 trillion in market value just this month.】

item.title: 哈萨克斯坦将关键利率维持在 16.5%，通胀率创两年新高
item.description: 哈萨克斯坦中央银行在第四次会议上维持了借贷成本不变，但在物价增长保持在近两年来的最高水平后，该行对未来上调借贷成本持开放态度。【原文：Kazakhstan’s central bank held borrowing costs for a fourth meeting but signaled openness to a future increase after price growth remained at its highest level in almost two years.】

item.title: 检察官要求判处亿万富翁 Kakao 创始人 15 年监禁
item.description: 韩国检方要求判处 Kakao 公司创始人布莱恩-金（Brian Kim）15 年监禁，指控这位亿万富翁在对 K-pop 大公司 SM 娱乐公司（SM Entertainment Co.【原文：South Korean prosecutors sought a 15-year prison term for Kakao Corp. founder Brian Kim, accusing the billionaire of manipulating stock prices during a high-stakes takeover battle for K-pop powerhouse SM Entertainment Co.】

item.title: 德国股票溢价令投资者要求提供利润证明
item.description: 德国股票的估值已经远远超过了历史水平，这使得一些投资者认为，在创纪录的涨势获得新的动力之前，大规模的经济刺激支出需要在公司利润中显现出来。【原文：German stock valuations have raced well beyond historic levels, leaving some investors saying that massive stimulus spending needs to show up in company profits before the record-setting rally can gain fresh momentum.】

item.title: 尽管面临挑战，中国铜冶炼企业利润仍创十年新高
item.description: 在全球原料供应紧缩、海外竞争对手受挫的情况下，中国主要铜冶炼企业上半年盈利强劲。【原文：China’s major copper smelters delivered strong first-half earnings, amid a global squeeze on feedstock supply that has battered overseas rivals.】

item.title: 中国从美国制裁的俄罗斯设施接收液化天然气货物
item.description: 根据船运跟踪数据，一个中国国营码头似乎从一个受美国制裁的俄罗斯设施接收了一些液化天然气，这将标志着莫斯科在努力维持其能源出口的过程中首次进行此类贸易。【原文：A Chinese state-run terminal appeared to take delivery of some liquefied natural gas from a US-sanctioned Russian facility, according to shiptracking data, which would mark the first such trade as Moscow tries to maintain its energy exports.】

item.title: 法国和西班牙 8 月通胀率低于预期
item.description: 法国和西班牙本月的通胀率略低于预期，但表明整个欧元区的通胀率没有出现大的偏差，欧元区的物价增长最近达到了欧洲中央银行 2% 的目标。【原文：Inflation in France and Spain was a touch less than expected this month but suggested no major deviation for the euro zone as a whole, where price growth recently hit the European Central Bank’s 2% target.】

item.title: 香港建筑商英皇获银行集团支持延长贷款期限
item.description: 香港建筑商英皇国际控股有限公司（Hong Kong builder International Holdings Ltd.，简称英皇国际控股）重组计划中的一项重要内容获得了一批主要银行的支持，即延长约 165 亿港元（合 21 亿美元）逾期贷款的期限。【原文：Hong Kong builder Emperor International Holdings Ltd. has won the backing of a key group of banks for a pillar of its restructuring plan — a proposal to extend about HK$16.5 billion ($2.1 billion) in overdue loans.】
